Item ID2015

Vodka is a clear spirit that is relatively rare in RuneScape. It can be obtained from Heckel Funch's in the Gnome Stronghold, The Asp & Snake Bar at Pollnivneach, and Jossik in the Lighthouse. There is also a chance of receiving a bottle during the King's Ransom quest.

Uses[edit | edit source]

When consumed, Vodka boosts Strength by 1 + floor(Strength Level * 0.05) at the expense of lowering Attack by floor(Current Attack Level * 0.02) - 3. It also heals 5 hitpoints. Drinking it is not advised since strength potions can provide a much larger boost without any negative side effects.

Vodka is used during Eadgar's Ruse to make Alco-chunks. In the quest, players use vodka on the parrots' drinking water in Ardougne Zoo, along with Pineapple chunks. This is required to obtain a Drunk parrot, an item specific to the quest.

Two bottles of Vodka are needed to complete the Bone Voyage quest.

A bottle of Vodka is one of the possible items you may receive from one of King Arthur's knights during King's Ransom, though it serves no purpose in the actual quest.

Vodka is also used in the Gnome Restaurant activity.

rawContent: {{External|rs|rsc}} {{Infobox Item |name = Vodka |image = [[File:Vodka.png]] |release = [[12 December]] [[2002]] |update = Agility skill online |members = Yes |quest = No |tradeable = Yes |placeholder = Yes |equipable = No |stackable = No |noteable = Yes |options = Drink |destroy = Drop |examine = An absolutely clear spirit. |value = 5 |weight = 1.000 |exchange = Yes |id = 2015 }} [[File:Vodka detail.png|left|50px]] '''Vodka''' is a clear spirit that is relatively rare in ''[[RuneScape]]''. It can be obtained from [[Heckel Funch]]'s in the [[Tree Gnome Stronghold|Gnome Stronghold]], [[The Asp & Snake Bar]] at [[Pollnivneach]], and [[Jossik]] in the [[Lighthouse]]. There is also a chance of receiving a bottle during the [[King's Ransom]] quest. ==Uses== When consumed, Vodka boosts [[Strength]] by 1 + floor(Strength Level * 0.05) at the expense of lowering [[Attack]] by floor(Current Attack Level * 0.02) - 3. It also heals 5 hitpoints. Drinking it is not advised since [[strength potion]]s can provide a much larger boost without any negative side effects. Vodka is used during [[Eadgar's Ruse]] to make [[Alco-chunks]]. In the quest, players use vodka on the parrots' drinking water in [[Ardougne Zoo]], along with [[Pineapple chunks]]. This is required to obtain a [[Drunk parrot]], an item specific to the quest. Two bottles of Vodka are needed to complete the [[Bone Voyage]] quest. A bottle of Vodka is one of the possible items you may receive from one of [[King Arthur]]'s knights during [[King's Ransom]], though it serves no purpose in the actual quest. Vodka is also used in the [[Gnome Restaurant]] activity. ==Products== {{Uses material list|Vodka}} ==Shop locations== {{Store locations list|Vodka}} {{Gnome cooking}} {{Alcoholic beverages}}
